headline: VULCAN DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK
summary: The Board of Directors of Vulcan Materials Company (NYSE: VMC) today declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.49 per share on its common stock. The dividend will be payable on November 25, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on November 10, 2025.

raw.headline: VULCAN DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK

headline: What to Expect From Vulcan Materials’ Q3 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Vulcan Materials will release its third-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts anticipate a double-digit bottom-line growth.
